meanings.definition: A person or thing that infects.
meanings.sent1: The infectors spread germs to others.
meanings.sent2: The infectors in the hospital need to wear masks.
meanings.sent3: The infectors at the picnic accidentally shared their colds.
meanings.sent4: The infectors of negativity can impact our mood.
meanings.sent5: The infectors of disease lurked in the shadows, waiting to strike.

meanings.sent1: The infectors were found in different parts of the body.
meanings.sent2: She collected various infectors for her science project.
meanings.sent3: The infectors gathered for a meeting to discuss their plans.
meanings.sent4: The infectors swarmed together like a colony of ants.
meanings.sent5: The infectors lined up, ready to cause trouble.
